column2:
"Lately, there's been too many ARKS
who don't use Autowords！
It's a waste！"

"状況に応じたメッセージを出す
オートワードは、自身の状況を
知らせるのに重要、だというのに……！"

"ええい、話している内にも
不安が鎌首をもたげてきた！
君、今すぐやってくるといい！"

"何を、って、決まっているだろう。
オートワードの設定だ！
クエストクリア時の設定だ！"

"Come on, come ooonnn!
This shouldn't be difficult!
Wipe away my fears!"

"Autowords are a chat function which allows
your character to speak in specific situations
without you having to do anything.

You can set Autowords with
\"System\"→\"Chat Settings\"→\"Autowords\".

Register Autowords by entering text
in the input fields for each situation.

If you want more than one Autoword for a situation,
press \"+\" to add an input field."

"Greet your allies at the start of a quest,
call for help when you're unable to battle;
There's all kinds of ways you can use them.

Have fun with the game
using Autowords."
